title: Tenchi Muyou! Ryo-Ohki 2 (Dub)
alternative_title: Tenchi Muyou! Ryououki 2nd Season, Tenchi Muyo! Ryo-Ohki
description: This OVA series gives the viewer more in-depth details on Sasami, Washu, and Ryo-ohki, as well as introducing members of the Juraian royal family.
